#summary How to use rutorrent

<wiki:toc />

= Introduction =

This page will serve as a general "how to" for the basic day to day use or rutorrent.

== Top Menu Bar http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/6357/menubar.png ==

The top Menu Bar has some quick action buttons.  
These include:
 * http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/5994/icon01start.png Add a torrent
 * http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/2161/icon02remove.png Remove
 * http://img144.imageshack.us/img144/5613/icon03play.png Start
 * http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/4872/icon04pause.png Pause
 * http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8159/icon05stop.png Stop
 * http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/5652/icon06settings.png Settings
 * http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/4756/icon07about.png About 
 * http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/6176/icon08create.png Create _optional plugin_
 * http://img693.imageshack.us/img693/1561/icon09rss.png RSS _optional plugin_

== Left Side Menu ==

<img src="http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/1741/leftside.png" align="left">
   * <font size="4" face="Verdana"><b>State:</b></font><font size="3" face="Verdana">Sorts torrents by category</font><BR CLEAR="all">
<font size="3" face="Verdana"> <b>    All:</b></font><font size="2" face="Verdana"> All torrents, running, stopped, seeding, finished</font><BR CLEAR="all">
<font size="3" face="Verdana"> <b>Download:</b></font><font size= "2" face="Verdana"> Torrents which are downloading (stopped, but incomplete torrents will show here)</font><BR CLEAR="all">
<font size="3" face="Verdana"> <b>Finished:</b></font><font size="2" face="Verdana"> Finished torrents, (seeding or Complete)</font><BR CLEAR="all">
<font size="3" face="Verdana"> <b>Active:</b></font><font size="2" face="Verdana"> Torrents which are currently uploading or downloading data </font><BR CLEAR="all">
<font size="3" face="Verdana"> <b>Inactive:</b></font><font size="2" face="Verdana"> Torrents which are not currently uploading or downloading data  </font><BR CLEAR="all">
<font size="3" face="Verdana"> <b>Error</b></font><font size="2" face="Verdana"> Torrents which have received an error notification from the tracker. </font><BR CLEAR="all">
   * <font size="4" face="Verdana"><b>Labels:</b></font><font size="3" face="Verdana">Lets you sort by label (Requires the [PluginsLabel Labels] plugin)</font><BR><BR CLEAR="all">
<BR><BR><BR>
   * <font size="4" face="Verdana"><b>Tracker:</b></font><font size="3" face="Verdana"> Lets you sort by Tracker (Requires the [PluginsTracklabels TrackLabels] Plugin</font><BR><BR CLEAR="all">
<BR><BR><BR>
   * <font size="4" face="Verdana"><b>Search:</b></font><font size="3" face="Verdana"> Lets you sort by local Search Query (Requires the [PluginsSearch Search] Plugin</font><BR><BR CLEAR="all">
<BR><BR>
   * <font size="4" face="Verdana"><b>Feeds:</b></font><font size="3" face="Verdana"> Lets you view rss items (Requires the [PluginsRSS RSS] Plugin</font><BR><BR CLEAR="all">
<BR><BR><BR>
